segments.text: I notice the woman drying dishes, and she’s completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she’s just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it’s making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for the cookies, and the stool is wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so shocked when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with it before the stool falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
